Posts.EditableText: I am creating a game that uses the wait for key press command frequently, and I have a timer that I want to activate one as well, after a period of time. Is there a way to deactivate the timer when waiting for a key press and restart it after the key press so as not to get an error waiting for two key presses?

Posts.EditableText: You can actually do just that. Disable the timer when before you go to get a keypress and then re-enable it when done. (My first thought was setting and clearing a flag that the timer checks, but that might end up being the same thing.)
